turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to schedule an appointment with a doctor.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can help with that. Which doctor would you like to see, or which specialty are you looking for? And what is the reason for your visit?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. I need to see a dermatologist. It's for a follow-up on a rash I had. Preferably Dr. Miller, if he's available.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Alright, a follow-up with Dr. Miller in Dermatology for a rash. Got it. What are your preferred days and times for the appointment?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, this is always the tricky part. I need a weekday, either Monday or Tuesday, anytime in the afternoon after 1 PM. It HAS to be this week or next week. And can you guarantee Dr. Miller won't be double-booked again? That was such a hassle last time.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your concern about double-booking. Our system aims to prevent scheduling conflicts, but unforeseen circumstances can occasionally arise. I will search for available slots with Dr. Miller on a Monday or Tuesday afternoon, after 1 PM, this week or next week. Please wait a moment while I check the schedule.
